}

2. Duy·ªát m·∫£ng b·∫±ng for-each (Enhanced for loop)

-D√πng ƒë·ªÉ duy·ªát qua c√°c ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ trong m·∫£ng (array) ho·∫∑c collection (List, Set,‚Ä¶) m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn ch·ªâ s·ªë (index).

     for (Ki·ªÉu_d·ªØ_li·ªáu bi·∫øn : t·∫≠p_h·ª£p) {
       // x·ª≠ l√Ω v·ªõi bi·∫øn
     }

- L∆∞u √Ω:

  • for-each kh√¥ng d√πng ƒë∆∞·ª£c khi b·∫°n c·∫ßn bi·∫øt ch·ªâ s·ªë ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ (index) ho·∫∑c mu·ªën s·ª≠a gi√° tr·ªã trong m·∫£ng.
  • N·∫øu c·∫ßn th√™m/x√≥a ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ trong v√≤ng l·∫∑p, n√™n d√πng Iterator thay v√¨ for-each.

3. String v√† thao t√°c chu·ªói (substring, replace, split, etc.)

  • String trong Java l√† immutable (b·∫•t bi·∫øn):

     s.toUpperCase(); // kh√¥ng thay ƒë·ªïi s

  • C√°c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c th√¥ng d·ª•ng:

       |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c        | M√¥ t·∫£                               | V√≠ d·ª•                                            |
   |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | substring()        | C·∫Øt chu·ªói con                       | "hello".substring(1, 3) ‚Üí "el"                   |
   | replace()          | Thay th·∫ø k√Ω t·ª±                      | "java".replace('a', 'o') ‚Üí "jovo"                |
   | split()            | T√°ch chu·ªói th√†nh m·∫£ng               | "a,b,c".split(",") ‚Üí ["a", "b", "c"]             |
   | indexOf()          | V·ªã tr√≠ k√Ω t·ª±/chu·ªói con ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n     | "java".indexOf("v") ‚Üí 2                          |
   | equals()           | So s√°nh n·ªôi dung                    | "abc".equals("abc") ‚Üí true                       |
   | equalsIgnoreCase() | So s√°nh b·ªè qua hoa/th∆∞·ªùng           | "Java".equalsIgnoreCase("java") ‚Üí true           |
   |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

4. StringBuilder, StringBuffer ‚Äì hi·ªáu su·∫•t thao t√°c chu·ªói

  • StringBuilder :

    • D√πng trong c√°c ·ª©ng d·ª•ng single-thread.
  • StringBuffer:

    • Nh∆∞ng do vi·ªác ƒë·ªìng b·ªô n√™n s·∫Ω ch·∫≠m h∆°n StringBuilder.

5. So s√°nh hi·ªáu su·∫•t

     |---------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | T√≠nh nƒÉng             | String    | StringBuilder | StringBuffer    |
     |---------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | T√≠nh b·∫•t bi·∫øn         | C√≥        | Kh√¥ng         | Kh√¥ng           |
     | Thread-safe           | Kh√¥ng     | Kh√¥ng         | C√≥              |
     | Hi·ªáu su·∫•t thao t√°c    | Ch·∫≠m nh·∫•t | Nhanh nh·∫•t    | Trung b√¨nh      |
     | D√πng trong m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng | VB·∫•t k·ª≥   | Single-thread | Multi-thread    |
     |---------------------------------------------------------------------|

V. L·∫≠p tr√¨nh h∆∞·ªõng ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng - OOP (Object-Oriented Programming)

1. L·ªõp v√† ƒê·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng(Class & Object)

  • ƒê·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng(Object) ch√≠nh l√† m·ªôt th·ªÉ hi·ªán c·ª• th·ªÉ c·ªßa m·ªôt l·ªõp. Hay n√≥i c√°ch kh√°c, n√≥ l√† m·ªôt ‚Äòs·∫£n ph·∫©m‚Äô ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫°o ra t·ª´ b·∫£n thi·∫øt k·∫ø ƒë√≥. 2. T√≠nh ƒë√≥ng g√≥i(Encapsulation)

  • T√≠nh ƒë√≥ng g√≥i(Encapsulation) l√† m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng nguy√™n l√Ω c∆° b·∫£n c·ªßa OOP, hi·ªÉu ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n l√† vi·ªác gom c√°c thu·ªôc t√≠nh v√† h√†nh vi c√≥ li√™n quan l·∫°i th√†nh m·ªôt th·ªÉ th·ªëng nh·∫•t (l√† m·ªôt l·ªõp) v√† ·∫©n ƒëi c√°c chi ti·∫øt tri·ªÉn khai b√™n trong, ch·ªâ cho ph√©p truy c·∫≠p th√¥ng qua c√°c giao di·ªán c√¥ng khai (public methods)

  • Trong l·∫≠p tr√¨nh, t√≠nh ƒë√≥ng g√≥i gi√∫p b·∫£o v·ªá d·ªØ li·ªáu kh·ªèi b·ªã truy c·∫≠p ho·∫∑c thay ƒë·ªïi tr·ª±c ti·∫øp m·ªôt c√°ch kh√¥ng mong mu·ªën, t·ª´ ƒë√≥ gi√∫p m√£ ngu·ªìn an to√†n v√† d·ªÖ b·∫£o tr√¨ h∆°n.

  • Kinh nghi·ªám d·ª± √°n: V·ªõi nh·ªØng d·ª± √°n l·ªõn c√≥ nhi·ªÅu th√†nh vi√™n trong team, th√¨ t√≠nh ƒë√≥ng g√≥i gi√∫p ngƒÉn ch·∫∑n c√°c truy c·∫≠p thay ƒë·ªïi, nh·∫ßm l·∫´n t·ª´ c√°c th√†nh vi√™n kh√°c. 3. K·∫ø th·ª´a(Inheritance)

  • K·∫ø th·ª´a(Inheritance) l√† m·ªôt c∆° ch·∫ø trong OOP cho ph√©p m·ªôt l·ªõp con(subclass) c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª´a h∆∞·ªüng c√°c thu·ªôc t√≠nh v√† h√†nh vi t·ª´ m·ªôt l·ªõp cha(superclass). ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p ch√∫ng ta t√°i s·ª≠ d·ª•ng m√£ ngu·ªìn, tr√°nh vi·ªác ph·∫£i vi·∫øt l·∫°i nh·ªØng ph·∫ßn gi·ªëng nhau.
    • V√≠ d·ª•: ch√∫ng ta c√≥ l·ªõp cha l√† DongVat. C√°c l·ªõp con nh∆∞ Cho, Meo, Chim ƒë·ªÅu c√≥ th·ªÉ k·∫ø th·ª´a c√°c thu·ªôc t√≠nh chung nh∆∞ soChan, mauLong v√† c√°c h√†nh vi nh∆∞ diChuyen, an. Sau ƒë√≥, m·ªói l·ªõp con c√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m v√†o nh·ªØng ƒë·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm ho·∫∑c h√†nh vi ri√™ng c·ªßa m√¨nh, v√≠ d·ª• Cho c√≥ th√™m h√†nh vi sua, Meo c√≥ th√™m h√†nh vi keuMeoMeo.

4. ƒêa h√¨nh (Polymorphism)

  • ƒêa h√¨nh(Polymorphism) nghƒ©a l√† m·ªôt ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng c√≥ th·ªÉ mang nhi·ªÅu h√¨nh th√°i kh√°c nhau, ho·∫∑c m·ªôt h√†nh ƒë·ªông c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·ª±c hi·ªán theo nhi·ªÅu c√°ch kh√°c nhau t√πy thu·ªôc v√†o ng·ªØ c·∫£nh. C√≥ hai lo·∫°i ƒë√£ h√¨nh ch√≠nh l√†:

    • ƒêa h√¨nh l√∫c bi√™n d·ªãch(Compile-time Polymorphism), th∆∞·ªùng ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·∫øt ƒë·∫øn qua n·∫°p ch·ªìng ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c(Method Overloading). t·ª©c l√† trong m·ªôt l·ªõp, ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ c√≥ nhi·ªÅu ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c c√πng t√™n nh∆∞ng kh√°c nhau v·ªÅ s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng ho·∫∑c ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa tham s·ªë, ho·∫∑c d·ªØ li·ªáu tr·∫£ v·ªÅ. V√≠ d·ª• ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c tinhTong(int a, int b) v√† tinhTong(double a, double b, double c).
    • ƒêa h√¨nh l√∫c ch·∫°y(Runtime Polymorphism), th∆∞·ªùng ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·∫øt ƒë·∫øn qua ghi ƒë√® ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c(Method Overriding). T·ª©c l√† l·ªõp con ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a l·∫°i m·ªôt ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c ƒë√£ c√≥ ·ªü l·ªõp cha. V√≠ d·ª•, l·ªõp DongVat c√≥ ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c tiengKeu(), nh∆∞ng l·ªõp Cho v√† Meo ƒë·ªÅu ghi ƒë√® ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c n√†y ƒë·ªÉ ph√°t ra ti·∫øng k√™u ri√™ng c·ªßa ch√∫ng (‚Äòg√¢u g√¢u‚Äô v√† ‚Äòmeo meo‚Äô). ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p ch∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh linh ho·∫°t h∆°n khi x·ª≠ l√Ω c√°c ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng thu·ªôc c√°c l·ªõp kh√°c nhau nh∆∞ng c√≥ c√πng m·ªôt h√†nh vi chung.‚Äù

5. Tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng (Abstraction)

  • Tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng(Abstraction) l√† qu√° tr√¨nh ·∫©n ƒëi c√°c chi ti·∫øt ph·ª©c t·∫°p v√† ch·ªâ hi·ªÉn th·ªã nh·ªØng th√¥ng tin c·∫ßn thi·∫øt ra b√™n ngo√†i. N√≥ t·∫≠p trung v√†o ‚Äòc√°i g√¨‚Äô h∆°n l√† ‚Äòl√†m nh∆∞ th·∫ø n√†o‚Äô. Trong OOP, ch√∫ng ta th∆∞·ªùng ƒë·∫°t ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√≠nh tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng th√¥ng qua l·ªõp tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng(Abstract Class) v√† giao di·ªán(Interface).
    • V√≠ d·ª•: Khi thi·∫øt k·∫ø ph·∫ßn x·ª≠ l√Ω thanh to√°n ƒë∆°n h√†ng. C·ª• th·ªÉ, ta t·∫°o m·ªôt interface l√† PaymentMethod - trong ƒë√≥ ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a c√°c h√†nh vi chung nh∆∞ processPayment() v√† refund(). Sau ƒë√≥, ch√∫ng ta tri·ªÉn khai nhi·ªÅu class kh√°c nhau nh∆∞ CreditCardPayment, PaypalPayment, v√† BankTransferPayment, m·ªói class s·∫Ω c√≥ c√°ch x·ª≠ l√Ω thanh to√°n ri√™ng ph√π h·ª£p v·ªõi t·ª´ng ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c c·ª• th·ªÉ. Nh·ªù v·∫≠y, ·ªü bussiness logic, v√≠ d·ª• nh∆∞ khi x·ª≠ l√Ω ƒë∆°n h√†ng, ch√∫ng ta ch·ªâ c·∫ßn g·ªçi paymentMethod.processPayment() m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn quan t√¢m chi ti·∫øt n√≥ l√† thanh to√°n qua th·∫ª, qua PayPal hay chuy·ªÉn kho·∫£n ng√¢n h√†ng. ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y gi√∫p code d·ªÖ m·ªü r·ªông, v√≠ d·ª• sau n√†y c√≥ th√™m MOMO hay ZaloPay th√¨ ch·ªâ c·∫ßn t·∫°o th√™m m·ªôt class m·ªõi implement PaymentMethod m√† kh√¥ng ph·∫£i s·ª≠a code x·ª≠ l√Ω ƒë∆°n h√†ng.

VI. C√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn OOP n√¢ng cao(Advanced OOP Concepts)

  1. this, super

  • this: ƒë·∫°i di·ªán cho m·ªôt ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng hi·ªán t·∫°i.

    • Truy c·∫≠p bi·∫øn ho·∫∑c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c c·ªßa ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng ƒë√≥.

    • G·ªçi constructor kh√°c trong c√πng class

      class Person {
  String name;
  Person(String name) {
    this.name = name; // ph√¢n bi·ªát bi·∫øn instance v√† tham s·ªë
  }
}

  • super: ƒë·∫°i di·ªán cho l·ªõp cha (supper class)

    • D√πng ƒë·ªÉ g·ªçi constructor ho·∫∑c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c c·ªßa l·ªõp cha.

      class Animal {
  void speak() {
    System.out.println("Animal speaks");
  }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
  void speak() {
    super.speak(); // g·ªçi ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c l·ªõp cha
    System.out.println("Dog barks");
  }
}
  1. Constructor - Constructor overloading

  • Constructor: ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát, c√πng t√™n class, kh√¥ng c√≥ ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu tr·∫£ v·ªÅ.

      class Student {
    String name;
    Student(String n) {
      name = n;
    }
  }

  • Constructor overloading: nhi·ªÅu constructor c√πng t√™n nh∆∞ng kh√°c tham s·ªë.

      class Student {
    String name;
    int age;

    Student(String n) {
      name = n;
    }

    Student(String n, int a) {
      this.name = n;
      this.age = a;
    }
  }

  1. Method Overloading vs Overriding

     |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |       ƒê·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm              | Overloading                                        | Overriding                                          |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | ƒê·ªãnh nghƒ©a                  | C√πng t√™n ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c, kh√°c tham s·ªë trong c√πng l·ªõp  | C√πng t√™n, c√πng tham s·ªë, kh√°c l·ªõp (cha - con)        |
 | M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch                    | TƒÉng t√≠nh ƒëa h√¨nh tƒ©nh (compile time polymorphism) | TƒÉng t√≠nh ƒëa h√¨nh ƒë·ªông (runtime polymorphism)       |
 | Quan h·ªá l·ªõp                 | Trong c√πng m·ªôt l·ªõp                                 | Gi·ªØa l·ªõp cha v√† l·ªõp con                             |
 | Quy t·∫Øc | VB·∫•t k·ª≥           | Tham s·ªë kh√°c nhau (ki·ªÉu, s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng, th·ª© t·ª±)         | Ph·∫£i gi·ªëng ho√†n to√†n v·ªÅ t√™n, ki·ªÉu, th·ª© t·ª± tham s·ªë   |
 | Th·ªùi ƒëi·ªÉm quy·∫øt ƒë·ªãnh        | Compile time                                       | Runtime                                             |
 | Annotation d√πng ƒë∆∞·ª£c kh√¥ng? | Kh√¥ng d√πng @Override                               | N√™n d√πng @Override ƒë·ªÉ tr√°nh l·ªói ƒë√°nh m√°y            |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

V√≠ d·ª•:

Overloading:

    class Calculator {
      int add(int a, int b) { return a + b; }
      double add(double a, double b) { return a + b; }
    }

Overriding:

    class Animal {
      void sound() { System.out.println("Some sound"); }
    }

    class Dog extends Animal {
    @Override
      void sound() { System.out.println("Woof"); }
    }
  1. final, static, abstract, interface, enum

a. final

     |-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng |       √ù nghƒ©a                                      |
     |-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Bi·∫øn (variable)    | Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ thay ƒë·ªïi gi√° tr·ªã sau khi g√°n (h·∫±ng s·ªë)   |
     | Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c        | Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ override ·ªü l·ªõp con                       |
     | L·ªõp (class)        | Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ k·∫ø th·ª´a                                  |
     |-------------------------------------------------------------------------|

v√≠ d·ª•:

    final class Constants {
      public static final double PI = 3.14159;
    }

b. static

     |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng | √ù nghƒ©a                                                                                  |
     |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Bi·∫øn (variable)    | Bi·∫øn d√πng chung cho t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng c·ªßa l·ªõp                                         |
     | Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c        | G·ªçi m√† kh√¥ng c·∫ßn t·∫°o ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng                                                           |
     | Block              | ƒê∆∞·ª£c ch·∫°y m·ªôt l·∫ßn duy nh·∫•t khi class ƒë∆∞·ª£c load, ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·ª±c thi tr∆∞·ªõc c·∫£ main() v√† tr∆∞·ªõc   |
     |                    | khi t·∫°o ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng                                                                        |
     | L·ªõp (class)        | Ch·ªâ d√πng v·ªõi nested class (l·ªõp b√™n trong), kh√¥ng th·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p bi·∫øn non-static b√™n ngo√†i  |
     |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

v√≠ d·ª•: static block

    public class StaticBlockExample {
      static int value;

      // static block
      static {
        System.out.println("Static block executed");
        value = 100;
      }

      public StaticBlockExample() {
        System.out.println("Constructor called");
      }

      public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Main method started");
        StaticBlockExample obj = new StaticBlockExample();
        System.out.println("Value = " + StaticBlockExample.value);
      }
    }

static class

    public class OuterClass {
      int outerValue = 10;
      static int staticOuterValue = 20;

      static class StaticNestedClass {
        void display() {
          // System.out.println(outerValue); // Error: Cannot access non-static
          System.out.println("Static outer value: " + staticOuterValue);
        }
      }

      public static void main(String[] args) {
        OuterClass.StaticNestedClass nested = new OuterClass.StaticNestedClass();
        nested.display();
      }
    }

c. abstract

     |--------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng | √ù nghƒ©a                                       |
     |--------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | Ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c        | Kh√¥ng c√≥ th√¢n h√†m, b·∫Øt bu·ªôc l·ªõp con override  |
     | L·ªõp (class)        | Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ t·∫°o ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng, ch·ªâ ƒë·ªÉ k·∫ø th·ª´a       |
     |--------------------------------------------------------------------|

V√≠ d·ª•:

    abstract class Animal {
      abstract void sound();
    }

    class Cat extends Animal {
      void sound() { System.out.println("Meow"); }
    }

d. interface

  • L√† m·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p c√°c ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng (Java 8 tr·ªü ƒëi h·ªó tr·ª£ default + static method)

  • M·ªôt l·ªõp c√≥ th·ªÉ implement nhi·ªÅu interface V√≠ d·ª•:

      interface Movable {
    void move();
  }

  class Car implements Movable {
    public void move() {
      System.out.println("Car is moving");
    }
  }

e. enum

  • ƒê·∫°i di·ªán cho m·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p h·∫±ng s·ªë c√≥ ƒë·ªãnh danh
  • C√≥ th·ªÉ c√≥ constructor, ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c, bi·∫øn

  • V√≠ d·ª•:

     enum Day {
   MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY;
 }

VII. Ph·∫°m vi truy c·∫≠p(Access Modifiers)

  1. Private
  • Ph·∫°m vi:Ch·ªâ truy c·∫≠p ƒë∆∞·ª£c trong c√πng m·ªôt class.
  • Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p t·ª´ class kh√°c, k·ªÉ c·∫£ trong c√πng package.

  • Th∆∞·ªùng d√πng cho:

    • Thu·ªôc t√≠nh (fields) ƒë·ªÉ b·∫£o v·ªá d·ªØ li·ªáu.
    • H√†m h·ªó tr·ª£ (helper methods) n·ªôi b·ªô.

V√≠ d·ª•:

    class MyClass {
      private int data;

      private void helperMethod() {
      // ch·ªâ d√πng n·ªôi b·ªô
      }
    }
  1. Default(package-private)
  • Ph·∫°m vi: Truy c·∫≠p ƒë∆∞·ª£c trong c√πng package.
  • Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p t·ª´ b√™n ngo√†i package.

  • Th∆∞·ªùng d√πng cho:

    • Class c·∫•p package (helper class)
    • Nh·ªØng method kh√¥ng c·∫ßn public nh∆∞ng v·∫´n c·∫ßn d√πng trong c√°c class c√πng package.

V√≠ d·ª•:

    class MyClass { // default class
      int count;    // default field

      void increase() { // default method
        count++;
      }
    }
  1. Protected

  • Ph·∫°m vi: Truy c·∫≠p ƒë∆∞·ª£c trong:

    • C√πng package
    • L·ªõp con (subclass), k·ªÉ c·∫£ khi subclass ·ªü package kh√°c.

  • Th∆∞·ªùng d√πng cho:

    • Class cha mu·ªën cho ph√©p l·ªõp con k·∫ø th·ª´a v√† s·ª≠ d·ª•ng.
    • M·ªôt c√°ch ti·∫øp c·∫≠n gi·ªØa private v√† public.

V√≠ d·ª•:

    public class Animal {
      protected void makeSound() {
        System.out.println("Some sound");
      }
    }

    class Dog extends Animal {
      void bark() {
        makeSound(); // h·ª£p l·ªá do k·∫ø th·ª´a
      }
    }
  1. Public
  • Ph·∫°m vi: M·ªçi n∆°i ƒë·ªÅu truy c·∫≠p ƒë∆∞·ª£c.
  • Th∆∞·ªùng d√πng cho:
    • API b√™n ngo√†i
    • Class ch√≠nh, method ch√≠nh (nh∆∞ public static void main).

V√≠ d·ª•:

    public class Person {
      public String name;

      public void sayHello() {
        System.out.println("Hello");
      }
    }

  1. T√≥m t·∫Øt v·ªÅ kh·∫£ nƒÉng truy c·∫≠p

     |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Access Modifier | C√πng class | C√πng package | Subclass(kh√°c package) |   B√™n ngo√†i   |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |    private      |    ‚úÖ     |       ‚ùå     |           ‚ùå           |     ‚ùå       |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |    default      |    ‚úÖ     |       ‚úÖ     |           ‚ùå           |     ‚ùå       |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |    protected    |    ‚úÖ     |       ‚úÖ     |           ‚úÖ           |     ‚ùå       |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |    public       |    ‚úÖ     |       ‚úÖ     |           ‚úÖ           |     ‚úÖ       |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

VIII. X·ª≠ l√Ω ngo·∫°i l·ªá(Exception Handlling)

Trong Java, Exception Handling gi√∫p ch∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh x·ª≠ l√Ω l·ªói m·ªôt c√°ch an to√†n m√† kh√¥ng b·ªã crash, duy tr√¨ lu·ªìng ch·∫°y m·∫°ch l·∫°c v√† ki·ªÉm so√°t logic khi c√≥ t√¨nh hu·ªëng b·∫•t th∆∞·ªùng x·∫£y ra.

  1. Try - Catch - Finally
  • M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch:
    • try: ch·ª©a ƒëo·∫°n code c√≥ th·ªÉ x·∫£y ra l·ªói.
    • catch: x·ª≠ l√Ω ngo·∫°i l·ªá n·∫øu x·∫£y ra.
    • finally: lu√¥n th·ª±c hi·ªán, d√π c√≥ hay kh√¥ng c√≥ l·ªói ‚Äì th∆∞·ªùng d√πng ƒë·ªÉ ƒë√≥ng t√†i nguy√™n.

  • C√∫ ph√°p:

      try {
    // ƒëo·∫°n code c√≥ th·ªÉ n√©m l·ªói
  } catch (ExceptionType e) {
    // x·ª≠ l√Ω l·ªói
  } finally {
    // lu√¥n th·ª±c hi·ªán (v√≠ d·ª•: ƒë√≥ng file, k·∫øt n·ªëi DB)
  }

  • V√≠ d·ª•:

      try {
    int result = 10 / 0; // ArithmeticException
  } catch (ArithmeticException e) {
    System.out.println("Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ chia cho 0!");
  } finally {
    System.out.println("K·∫øt th√∫c x·ª≠ l√Ω!");
  }
  1. Throw v√† Throws

  • throw: d√πng ƒë·ªÉ n√©m m·ªôt ngo·∫°i l·ªá c·ª• th·ªÉ trong code.

      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Sai tham s·ªë!");

  • throws: d√πng trong ch·ªØ k√Ω method ƒë·ªÉ khai b√°o r·∫±ng method n√†y c√≥ th·ªÉ n√©m ra ngo·∫°i l·ªá.

      public void readFile(String file) throws IOException {
    // logic ƒë·ªçc file
  }

  • V√≠ d·ª• ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß:

        public void divide(int a, int b) throws ArithmeticException {
      if (b == 0) {
        throw new ArithmeticException("Kh√¥ng chia ƒë∆∞·ª£c cho 0");
      }
      System.out.println(a / b);
    }

  1. Checked vs Unchecked Exception

     |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Lo·∫°i        | K·∫ø th·ª´a t·ª´                       | Compiler b·∫Øt bu·ªôc x·ª≠ l√Ω        | V√≠ d·ª•                      |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Checked     | Exception (tr·ª´ RuntimeException) | B·∫Øt bu·ªôc try-catch ho·∫∑c throws | IOException,               |
 |             |                                  |                                | SQLException,              |
 |             |                                  |                                | ParseException             |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Unchecked   | RuntimeException                 | Kh√¥ng b·∫Øt bu·ªôc x·ª≠ l√Ω           | NullPointerException,      |
 |             |                                  |                                | IllegalArgumentException,  |
 |             |                                  |                                | ArithmeticException        |
 |--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

  • V√≠ d·ª• Checked:

        public void readFile(String path) throws IOException {
      FileReader fr = new FileReader(path); // IOException l√† checked
    }

  • V√≠ d·ª• Unchecked:

        int[] arr = new int[3];
    arr[5] = 10; // ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException ‚Äì Unchecked
  1. T·∫°o ngo·∫°i l·ªá t√πy ch·ªânh(Custom Exception)
  • Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng:
    • Khi mu·ªën ƒë·∫°i di·ªán cho l·ªói nghi·ªáp v·ª• c·ª• th·ªÉ.
    • Gi√∫p code r√µ r√†ng, d·ªÖ hi·ªÉu, d·ªÖ b·∫£o tr√¨.

  • C√°ch t·∫°o:

        // 1. T·∫°o class k·∫ø th·ª´a Exception ho·∫∑c RuntimeException
    public class InvalidAgeException extends RuntimeException {
      public InvalidAgeException(String message) {
        super(message);
      }
    }

    // 2. D√πng throw ƒë·ªÉ n√©m l·ªói
    public void checkAge(int age) {
      if (age < 18) {
        throw new InvalidAgeException("Tu·ªïi ph·∫£i l·ªõn h∆°n 18");
      }
    }

IX. Collection Framework

Java Collection Framework l√† t·∫≠p h·ª£p c√°c interface v√† class d√πng ƒë·ªÉ l∆∞u tr·ªØ, x·ª≠ l√Ω v√† thao t√°c d·ªØ li·ªáu theo d·∫°ng collection (danh s√°ch, t·∫≠p h·ª£p, √°nh x·∫°, h√†ng ƒë·ª£i, v.v.).

  1. Interfaces: List, Set, Map, Queue

     |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Interface | ƒê·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm                                    | D√πng khi c·∫ßn                                                |
 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | List      | Cho ph√©p ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ tr√πng, c√≥ th·ª© t·ª±,          | Danh s√°ch c√≥ th·ª© t·ª± (ArrayList, LinkedList)                 |
 |           | truy c·∫≠p theo ch·ªâ s·ªë                        |                                                             |
 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Set       | Kh√¥ng cho ph√©p ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ tr√πng                | L∆∞u t·∫≠p h·ª£p kh√¥ng tr√πng l·∫∑p (HashSet, TreeSet)              |
 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Map       | L∆∞u theo c·∫∑p key-value, kh√¥ng cho key tr√πng | B·∫£n ƒë·ªì √°nh x·∫° (HashMap, TreeMap)                            |
 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Queue     | C·∫•u tr√∫c FIFO (First-In-First-Out)          | H√†ng ƒë·ª£i, x·ª≠ l√Ω theo th·ª© t·ª± v√†o (LinkedList, PriorityQueue) |
 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

  2. Implementations: ArrayList, LinkedList, HashSet, TreeSet, HashMap, TreeMap

     |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |   Class    | Implements  | ƒê·∫∑c ƒëi·ªÉm ch√≠nh                                        |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | ArrayList  | List        | M·∫£ng ƒë·ªông, truy c·∫≠p nhanh, ch√®n/x√≥a ch·∫≠m              |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | LinkedList | List, Queue | Danh s√°ch li√™n k·∫øt, ch√®n/x√≥a nhanh, truy c·∫≠p ch·∫≠m     |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | HashSet    | Set         | Kh√¥ng cho ph√©p ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ tr√πng, kh√¥ng ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o th·ª© t·ª±    |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | TreeSet    | Set         | S·∫Øp x·∫øp ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ theo th·ª© t·ª± t·ª± nhi√™n ho·∫∑c comparator  |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | HashMap    | Map         | Cho ph√©p null key/value, kh√¥ng s·∫Øp x·∫øp                |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | TreeMap    | Map         | S·∫Øp x·∫øp theo th·ª© t·ª± key (Comparable/Comparator)       |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

  3. Iterator, ListIterator, for-each

  • Iterator:

    • Duy·ªát qua collection.

    • H·ªó tr·ª£ x√≥a ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ khi duy·ªát.

          Iterator<String> it = list.iterator();
    while(it.hasNext()) {
      String s = it.next();
      if(s.equals("x")) it.remove(); // x√≥a ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ khi duy·ªát
    }

  • ListIterator:

    • Ch·ªâ d√πng v·ªõi List
    • Duy·ªát hai chi·ªÅu (next/previous), cho ph√©p th√™m, s·ª≠a, x√≥a trong qu√° tr√¨nh l·∫∑p.

  • for-each:

    • D·ªÖ d√πng, ng·∫Øn g·ªçn, kh√¥ng ch·ªânh s·ª≠a collection ƒë∆∞·ª£c.

          for (String s : list) {
      System.out.println(s);
    }

  1. So s√°nh HashMap vs Hashtable

     |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |   Ti√™u ch√≠              | HashMap                                   | Hashtable                                        |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | ƒê·ªìng b·ªô (Synchronized)  | Kh√¥ng                                     | C√≥                                               |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Hi·ªáu su·∫•t               | T·ªët h∆°n (trong m√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng ƒë∆°n lu·ªìng)      | K√©m h∆°n (do ƒë·ªìng b·ªô)                             |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Cho ph√©p null           | 1 null key, nhi·ªÅu null value              | Kh√¥ng cho null key/value                         |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Thay th·∫ø hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i       | ConcurrentHashMap d√πng thay cho Hashtable | ƒê√£ l·ªói th·ªùi                                      |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | M√¥i tr∆∞·ªùng s·ª≠ d·ª•ng      | D√πng cho ƒëa s·ªë ·ª©ng d·ª•ng                   | Kh√¥ng n√™n d√πng n·ªØa (tr·ª´ khi c·∫ßn ƒë·ªìng b·ªô c·ªï ƒëi·ªÉn) |
 |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
